FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 network command displays the IPv6 routes imported into the BGP routing table using the network command. The display bgp ipv6 network command displays the IPv6 routes imported into the BGP routing table using the network command. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the IPv6 routes advertised by BGP.
-
